name: Definitely not Titanic
description:
Embark on a magnificent journey on the Titanic. Unfortunately in the night of the 14th April 1912, the ship hits an Iceberg and start sinking. As a fellow crewmate you start trying to save the ship by moving around, hitting barrel to get wood to patch the holes before the water gets in the ship. Despite all your efforts, you were only delaying the inevitable...

CONTROLS : WASD to move.

Objective: 

-Destroy barrel to get wood.

-patch holes with wood.

-There is 3 floor, try taking the stairs.

if you are lucky enough to find a hammer (1% chance spawning), you will be able to patch the holes without using wood for 15 seconds! use it wisely!
